Gulp SVG Sprites (5 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • arrow-right


    <svg class="icon arrow-right"><use xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use></svg>

  • caddie


    <svg class="icon caddie"><use xlink:href="#caddie"></use></svg>

  • heart-border


    <svg class="icon heart-border"><use xlink:href="#heart-border"></use></svg>

  • heart-form


    <svg class="icon heart-form"><use xlink:href="#heart-form"></use></svg>

  • loupe


    <svg class="icon loupe"><use xlink:href="#loupe"></use></svg>
